Description:
Minimum Qualifications and Knowledge:Bachelor degree from an accredited university in Radiography, Radiology Technology or Medical/ Diagnostic Imaging program; Diploma in Radiology, Associate degree in Radiography.
UAE license or Eligibility is preferable.
 Fluency in English (speak, read and write).
Arabic speaking skills will be an added advantage.
Excellent Computer Literacy skills is required. Minimum Experience:Minimum 2+ years experience post qualification in ultrasonography field. Job Details
